We are dedicated to our students.

Our Mission


The mission of the Rockdale Magnet School for Science and Technology, a specialized research-focused learning community, is to foster and produce students who think ethically, critically, and independently while excelling in competitive academic environments. We aim to demonstrate high standards and expectations distinguished by rigorous, accelerated curriculum, four years of student-driven scientific research, personalized academic support and advisement, extracurricular activities, leadership and service opportunities, dedicated family and community involvement.


arrow_downward

What We Do


At Rockdale Magnet School, the Magnet Fund supports and host various events throughout the year to support the overall Magnet mission of Challenge, Opportunity, and Disinction. The Fund supports academic/travel opportunities likeNational Science League, Regional Science Fair, International Science and Engineering Fair, Regional/State Math competitions and many other events throughout the year.



The Fund also coordinates fundraising events to support the $150k+ budget for the RMSST including Monster Dash, Poinsettia Sale, and other fundraising efforts. The funds raised also support capital expenditures which are not supported through the normal RCPS budgeting process.
